channel.title: politics on A. Poupeau Website
channel.description: Recent content in politics on A. Poupeau Website

item.title: Gouverner le Climat
item.description: This is a great book that goes through the history of all the international conferences about climate change and shows how and why things have not evolved.

item.title: IPCC reports
item.description: The most important and reliable scientific source about climate change.

item.title: Merchants of Doubt
item.description: How a Handful of Scientists Obscured the Truth on Issues from Tobacco Smoke to Global Warming.

item.title: Penser la d√©croissance
item.description: A book written by different specialists where each has its own chapter. There are two books that follow after this one.

item.title: This Changes Everything
item.description: This is a must-read in order to understand the systemic causes and consequences in the Anthropocene.
